texto: 5.5.1 Criteria for processes The determination of the life cycle processes in this document is based upon three basic principles: 1) Each life cycle process has strong relationships among its outcomes, activities and tasks. 2) The dependencies among the processes are reduced to the greatest feasible extent. 3) A process is capable of execution by a single organization in the life cycle. 5.5.2 Description of processes Each process of this document is described in terms of the following attributes: a) The title conveys the scope of the process as a whole. b) The purpose describes the goals of performing the process. c) The outcomes express the observable results expected from the successful
